name: Intryc
tagline: AI scores tickets to your SOPs with 90% precision
description: Intryc scores and gives feedback on real support conversations. Now with AI simulations, agents can role play real past tickets and get scored instantly, cutting onboarding time by 50 percent and saving CX leads 12 to 15 hours of manual training each week.

name: Lyra
tagline: Record, transcribe + auto‚Äëcreate action items for every call
description: Lyra is the final meeting platform. Work with AI and your team to create follow-ups, drafts, and tasks live, no more screenshare. Meetings finish with actions, not just notes, and shared context carries across every call without an AI notetaker.

name: Layercode CLI
tagline: Build voice AI agents with one command
description: Build a voice AI agent in minutes, straight from your terminal. One command scaffolds your project with built-in tunneling, sample backends, and global edge deployment. Connect via webhook, use existing agent logic, pay only for speech (silence is free).

name: blai
tagline: AI crypto advisor that trades for you
description: Your AI Crypto advisor. The first AI investing app that trades for you, live today. Blai is ‚ÄúChat to trade‚Äù for Gen Z: prompt to research, build a portfolio, and buy/sell; the AI executes.

name: Dad Reply v1.5
tagline: Compose, reply, and send a üëç in a single click
description: Reply in one click.*‚Ä®No typing. No thinking.‚Ä®Just send it. * "Outlook already does this" ‚Äî you're using Outlook, sit down.

name: Androidify
tagline: The classic bot creator is back with Gemini
description: The classic Androidify app is back, now powered by Gemini. Turn your selfie or a simple prompt into a unique Android bot avatar. Use AI to generate custom backgrounds with image editing, create shareable stickers, and bring your bot to life.

name: Attrove AI
tagline: Summarizes Slack, Gmail, Calendar notifs into clear updates
description: Attrove is an AI-driven platform that seamlessly synthesizes information & communication, ensuring key insights and expertise are preserved and accessible so you can fuel productivity and continuity across your organization.

name: RedPill
tagline: Private AI gateway: encrypted requests to 200+ models
description: Redpill delivers AI privacy by design. All workloads execute in secure hardware enclaves ‚Äî every LLM query comes with a cryptographic proof so you never have to trust us blindly. Integrate easily via our simple SDK / API.

name: OpenLIT's Zero-code LLM Observability
tagline: Trace LLM requests + costs with OpenTelemetry monitoring
description: Zero-code full-stack observability for AI agents and LLM apps. OpenTelemetry-native monitoring for LLMs, VectorDBs, and GPUs with built-in guardrails, evaluations, prompt hub, and a secure vault. Fully self-hostable anywhere.

name: Praxim for Word
tagline: Cursor for Microsoft Word: What Word Copilot should've been
description: Praxim is the only agentic AI word editor that makes edits across your entire Word doc with formatting control, file and web context, and your personal preferences in mind. Tell Praxim what you'd like to do and Praxim will implement your changes automatically.

name: Proximity Lock System
tagline: Never worry about leaving your computer unlocked again.
description: Proximity Lock System is a Python CLI tool that automatically locks your system when your paired Bluetooth device (like your phone) goes out of range. It continuously monitors nearby devices, ensuring your computer stays secure when you step away.

name: PitchLab
tagline: Professional-grade pitch analysis using just your iPhone
description: PitchLab is an AI powered ball flight tracking app the has competitive accuracy to radar based technology for 1/100th the price. Advanced pitch metrics has become a staple in modern baseball. Now, anybody can get access to their data using just their phone.

name: Whitepanther | Campaign Started
tagline: All in One AI Powered Workspace
description: Experience a preview of WhitePanther ‚Äî the next-gen AI workspace. Our unified dashboard comes with built in team chats, meetings, time tracker, email marketing,screen recorder, AI Assistant and more features with integrations with your daily tools.

name: Learnraga
tagline: CBSE Music Notes
description: CBSE Music Notes App for High School Students (+1 and +2) with the latest syllabus and notes according to the new and latest CBSE exam pattern. CBSE Music Notes, MCQ, Sample Tests for +1 and +2, according to the latest syllabus

name: Collect 2.0
tagline: AI-powered customer onboarding built for high-volume SaaS
description: Collect has already helped hundreds of B2B SaaS companies improve their customer onboarding. With our new AI features, we‚Äôre taking it a step further by making onboarding faster, smarter, and effortless at scale.

name: ATH
tagline: Find pickup games and connect with other players
description: Are They Hooping is the #1 app for pickup basketball! We allow users to see whose playing basketball real time on a live map. One of the best parts of the app is that you can make real money!

name: Tadaima
tagline: AI Personal Assistant for Homeowners
description: Save time by letting AI-powered home services booking agent talk to local businesses for you. Privacy first without giving up access to your inbox.

name: Naitly
tagline: The only app that takes you to B1, B2, and C1 in English
description: Naitly - the only English learning app that guarantees real progress. From grammar to vocabulary, from listening to speaking, Naitly covers every skill you need to reach B1, B2, or C1 in a structured and engaging way

name: Orchestro
tagline: Trello for Claude Code an MCP server + dashboard
description: Orchestro is an open-source MCP server + real-time dashboard for Claude Code. Think ‚ÄúTrello for Claude Code‚Äù with a built-in Scrum Master: Task Decomposition, Dependency Tracking, Pattern Learning, Risk Detection, and a Real-time Dashboard. One-command install

name: EasyGrowth
tagline: Level Up Your Growth
description: EasyGrowth helps businesses scale and grow with innovative marketing strategies and growth solutions. We make generating leads as simple as playing Mario!
